body:
To Howsie sorry for using a Hack Client. The system says I was banned on December 16. 2013. It has ben around 6 months now. I'm sorry for what I've done to you and the server. I hope we can get along together.

I've sent a email to Support@avicus.net. I'm truly sorry. I await for your reply soon.

replies.body:
I've sent one I checked my Email and it got hacked I had to make a new one so I sent another appeal.

EDIT: My Email "MrMysterious@live.com.au" was hacked into, recovering it seemed impossible. :(
I went to make a new one (email) although when I made a new one. Although I noticed the only ones there you could have were "@outlook" or "@hotmail".

So from there I made a new Email address, I just hope the Managers will see that appeal, about my email being changed.

And yes 6 months has been a super long time.

replies.body: Actually, that sounds like a really bad idea. All appeals should be directed through the support email system. I don't know if that's been permitted in the past, but I can't imagine that the Managers/Directors are interested in getting appeal messages over Skype. That seems like a way "around the system," if you will. If some people have to wait for a reply from the support team, then everyone should. It's not fair for some people to get an instantaneous reply over Skype whilst others have to wait a day or two, maybe more, maybe less, to receive an email back.
replies.body_tagged: Actually, that sounds like a really bad idea. All appeals should be directed through the support email system. I don't know if that's been permitted in the past, but I can't imagine that the Managers/Directors are interested in getting appeal messages over Skype. That seems like a way "around the system," if you will. If some people have to wait for a reply from the support team, then everyone should. It's not fair for some people to get an instantaneous reply over Skype whilst others have to wait a day or two, maybe more, maybe less, to receive an email back.

Dear Nolan.

I'm not sure if you've read this whole thread but throughout this thread I've already previously stated that I've sent another appeal how my old email address had been hacked into, hence that is why I made a new Email and sent yet another appeal to inform them about my Email being changed.

replies.body:
3 things xD
 
1. Anti-Knockback will destroy someones KDR, if someone is on a high place and gets shot with an arrow you will not fall therefore making someone lose a kill
 
2. Why would you get a warning... Hacking is 1.illegal 2. breaking rules
 
3. I love how you still have that avicus love in your heart <3
